memo = {}
def C(n, r, p):
    ''' {n choose r} modulo p (p is prime) '''
    if r < 0 or r > n:
        return 0
    if r == 0 or r == n:
        return 1
    if n >= p: # Lucas theorem
        return C(n/p, r/p, p) * C(n%p, r%p, p) % p
    if (n, r, p) not in memo:
        memo[n, r, p] = (C(n-1, r-1, p) + C(n-1, r, p)) % p
    return memo[n, r, p]
t=int(raw_input())
p=int(1009)
for i in range(t):
    n,r=map(int,raw_input().split())
    print C(n,r,p)
